system.novice: Navigator Tracks the rail of a ship through Real Space as if using the Tracking Skill as long as the trail is no older than Perception Bonus Weeks (may vary with size and power of vessel).
system.adept: Can track a ship's trail up to Perception Bonus Months old, can track ships through the warp in the same manner.
system.master: Can track a ship's trail up to Perception Bonus Years old, although information may be errtic and fragmented.
